entry.title: Dawn at Hirosawa Pond・広沢池の明け方

link.title: Dawn at Hirosawa Pond・広沢池の明け方

entry.content:
I'm back in Japan now, and I have been doing a 2 week quarantine; staying home except for some early morning walks in my neighborhood.

Hirosawa Ike Pond in the Sagano area of Kyoto, as the rising sun illuminates the clouds; a small shrine juts out into the pond.

Walking through the Sagano farms to get to this location before dawn, I could see a lot of stars in the sky. Almost no lights in the fields, fortunately I've been here many times during the day, so I knew where I was going.

私は日本に戻っており、2週間の検疫を行っています。 私の近所の早朝の散歩を除いて家にいる。

京都の嵯峨野にある広沢池池。昇る太陽が雲を照らしている。 小さな神社が池に突き出ています。

夜明け前に嵯峨野農園を歩いてこの場所にたどり着くと、空にたくさんの星が見えました。 畑にはほとんど明かりがなく、幸い日中何度もここに来ていたので、どこに行くのかわかりました。
entry.summary: I'm back in Japan now, and I have been doing a 2 week quarantine; staying home except for some early morning walks in my neighborhood. Hirosawa Ike Pond in the Sagano area of Kyoto, as the rising sun illuminates the clouds; a small shrine juts out into the pond. Walking through the Sagano farms to get to this location before dawn, I could see a lot of stars in the sky. Almost no lights in the fields, fortunately I've been here many times during the day, so I knew where I was going.

entry.title: Hermosa Sunset
entry.content:
A tern walks along the beach, at low tide near the Hermosa Beach Pier.

ハモサの夕暮れ
ハモサビーチ桟橋近くの干潮時に、アジサシがビーチに沿って歩きます。
entry.summary: A tern walks along the beach, at low tide near the Hermosa Beach Pier.

entry.title: Jarvis Memorial
entry.content:
Hermosa Beach resident Greg Jarvis was on the Space Shuttle Challenger when it exploded soon after takeoff in 1986. There is a small memorial to him on the Strand, just north of the pier.

ジャービス・メモリアル
ハーモサビーチに住むグレッグ・ジャービスは、1986年にスペースシャトル「チャレンジャー」に搭乗し、離陸直後に爆発しました。桟橋のすぐ北側の海岸には、彼の小さな記念碑があります。
entry.summary: Hermosa Beach resident Greg Jarvis was on the Space Shuttle Challenger when it exploded soon after takeoff in 1986. There is a small memorial to him on the Strand, just north of the pier.
